name: Down the Clown
overview: Down The Clown brings one of the most popular midway games right to your game room. 1 or 2 players throw balls at the mechanical clowns, the more you knockdown, the more tickets you win! Featuring a custom canopy top, hand-made clowns, LED’s and a bright marquee, Down the Clown fits perfectly on the skill wall next to ICE’s Milk Jug Toss and ICE Ball!
